name: All-Star Baseball '99
description:
All-Star Baseball '99 is an action game.
All-Star Baseball '99 is available on Nintendo 64 and Game Boy.
Darrin Stubbington, Jaime Grieves and Jeff Spangenberg produced the game. It was directed by Bey Bickerton and Jeff Spangenberg. It was scored by Marc Schaefgen and Rick Fox.
